Reviews.Title: Feature rich and takes beatiful Pics
Reviews.Author: BookWorm620
Reviews.Content: This camera is not as good as some you can get in this price range, but it has a few very specific features that make it unique and definitely worth it if you are like me, the only photographer of an active family.I bought it almost solely because of the front LCD screen allowing me to take pictures of myself and other family members, and the Wifi Mobile App that allows me to use my cell phone as the viewfinder and picture taking remote, which allows me in even more pictures, and makes setting up posed group shots very easy.Both of these features work well. There is another App available that allows the camera to send me pictures through Wi-Fi without having to use a computer. Two important things to know about these features is:1)*Update* The apps are now available to everyone in both Apple and Android Appstores.But Samsung advised me they do not guarantee it to work with non-samsung phones.2)As with all apps they can be hit and miss, and sometimes take a few tries to get connected and working. They don't come with instructions, you just have to figure them out.I have tried fiddling with the settings myself, but since you cannot change shutter speed, only ISO and Metering, I was not pleased with any of the results. I get the best pictures on Auto-Mode, which is good news for people who don't want to have to think about settings. As long as it had decent light the pictures are always rich and sharp.The video shot was very good too although the voices seem a bit muted.I had heard bad thing about the battery life, but I find it a bit better that 2AA's I've used in previous cameras. The stock battery fully charged lasts me a whole family party and that's with a mix of pictures and videos. If your worried about battery life I picked a spare online for $15.My Recommendation: If the front LCD is not important to you I would go for theSamsung WB150F 14.2-megapixel Digital Camera. It has the same Wi-Fi  and specialty picture features and twice the optical zoom. It is 14mp vs 16mp, but that really won't make a difference in your pictures.

Reviews.Title: Missing a key feature
Reviews.Author: Persephone
Reviews.Content: I am not interested in Wi Fi capabilities---what I want is a good camera that performs well and is compact and easy to carry.  (I have a big honker with fancy lenses, etc if I want that.)  It is missing something very important:  the ability to snap a photo quickly.  The shutter lag is *terrible*---unless the subject is a statue and doesn't move, I miss shot after shot.  Add a flash and it gets even worse.  Even my old 2003 Sony Cybershot does better in this.  What good are all these fancy features when such a basic one is missing?I am about to give up on this and get something else, even though it's only 4 months old.  I am going to an event tonight and can't risk missing the shots, so am taking the old Sony instead.

Reviews.Title: The Samsung DV300F - The Social Media Camera
Reviews.Author: Tron "Steven Thomson"
Reviews.Content: What you get in the Package: (1) Lithium Ion Battery (1) Micro USB/USB cable (1) Outlet [connects to the USB cable so you don't need a laptop to charge your Camera] (1) One Year Warrenty (1) Samsung DV300F Dual View Smart Camera (1) Software Disk that includes:  - Intelli-Studio  - PC Auto Back Up (essentially it gives your PC software to send photos wirelessly to your wi-fi enabled laptop or desktop)  - Adobe Reader  - User ManualThe Samsung DV300F is a brilliant little camera from Samsung.  It's 16 megapixel resolution creates pictures with stunning details and with it's large amount of on board features offer a great camera experience for beginners and those seasoned camera pros.  The interface resembles that of a smart phone.  You need only swipe the little zoom knob (located on the top of the camera around the capture button) to navigate different windows.  the user can swipe between several options on the camera including: Basic, Wi-Fi, Scene, Magic, and Album.Basic's Menu (the default screen you'll see when starting it up)------------------------------------------------------------------------|You'll notice that there are 4 types of capture modes: - Smart Auto (Picture) - Smart Movie - Program (Picture) - MovieThe Smart functions are for those interested in getting a quick shot with the camera.  The camera will auto adjust to take the perfect photo of what ever your pointing at.  Smart movie does the same thing but for things your taking video of.  Normal mode (Program and Movie) allows users to hand tweak settings for more personal and optimized features.  What I like is that the camera gives you the freedom to adjust little things with the photo's and video you take but at a moment's notice when you need to snap a quick pic, you can switch to Smart Auto/Movie and catch it with out struggling with the menus.The Basic Menu also houses the Scene option (handy to quickly switch between various natural conditions and areas), Live Panorama (takes a series of photos as you slowly rotate from left to right holding down the capture button), and the settings area.Wi-fi's menu------------------------------------------|This is one of the features that make this camera stand out from all the others in the catagory.  It has built in Wifi, which allows users to snap a photo and (when in range of hotspots or personal networks) instantly post them to Facebook, Tumbler, etc.The menu includes:1) MobileLink - Allows you to connect a smartphone to your camera and copy captured photos and videos from the camera to the smartphone (requires app to be downloaded to phone).2) Remote Viewfinder - Lets you preview images from your camera to your smartphone (requires app to be downloaded onto phone).3) Social Sharing - Allows you to upload video/photos to social media sites.4) Email - lets you email photos/video5) Cloud - lets you upload photos/video to a cloud service6) Auto Backup - Allows you to transfer recent photos and videos to a PC wirelessly7) TV Link - Allows you to view photos/videos from other wireless items that are connected to the same network.Things I loved: - The camera has a screen built in on the front, which lets me to take self portraits and photos with friends that I would otherwise need someone else to hold the camera or take blind guesses as to how I looked. - The lens (when not in use) retracts back into the camera automatically when scrolling threw menus and the gallery.  It makes it easier to hold the camera if you've got big fingers.Things I hated: - The camera (when taking video) has a little slit in the upper left hand top of the camera (with the big screen facing you).  If you try to hold the camera you have to navagaite your fingers away from the voice recorder if you want to catch your voice with out it sounding muffled). - When you zoom in while videoing people or items, it makes the sound actually slow down.  So if your taking a video of your petitely voiced girlfriend for something and you zoom in while she's talking, it'll make her voice sound deeper for a few seconds.All in all the camera is an excellent product for those looking for a new camera but don't want to pay new camera money.

Reviews.Title: Perfect Mother's Day Gift
Reviews.Author: Ray
Reviews.Content: Bought for my mom who is a grandma of two. Upgrade from her Canon SD powershot. The best features for us so far are:our Pros:-Light weight-thinner than Canon SD powershots-children cartoons in front and can add music playing-do not need to remove microSD. plug the camera into computer. Just remove the wall prong end of the charger and the same chord can be plugged into the computer.-do not need to remove battery. Just plug in the charger into the wall and the chord into the camera.-you can even charge the camera while it's in the provided case.-to add more photo space, we set to 10M, which can fit 1,250 pictures with the 4G included.-If you distance yourself enough, the flash can produce good vibrant colors in auto mode (here auto mode is called Smart mode).-w/o flash, the colors via auto mode are pretty vibrant and accurate. Not too orange or blue, etc.-there's is a dedicated button on top jsut to turn on the lcd in front.-very colorful menu whose options look like iphone app icons. it's not touchscreen as far as i know. other cameras are jsut simple white text menus.Con:-switching from Photo-Video-Children mode is not in one menu. You have to go through tiny menu tabs that are only text. Not as intuitive, but one can get used to it. I was expecting a simpler menu or a switch that goes from photo to video at least. you need to go to the menu to go from photo to video to other modes. Seems like it's market was aimed towards teens and mothers of children.There are many other features we don't need like wi-fi, emailing directly from the camera, tranfering photos from camera to smartphone wirelessly, panoramic merge, color magic, fun distortions, but for our use, it's perfect and great price. So that's why i'd give it a 5 star.This kit comes in ONE box, not separate boxes like one for the camera, one for the SD card, one for the pouch. The kit is shrinkwrapped in one Samsung box. So that you can wrap as a single gift.other than the semi-intuitive menu, this is packed with more features than we need.

Reviews.Title: Too long to snap a picture
Reviews.Author: Ashley
Reviews.Content: I bought this camera on Groupon and it came with an 8gb memory card and a fairly nice case for $130 after tax. I thought that was a fantastic deal but as cool as it is to have the view on the front, the camera is SO SLOW! I have only been using it for a couple days but the lag is awful and I am not patient enough for it. It takes great pictures, just takes forever to get them. I am definitely sending this camera back

Reviews.Title: Broke within a few days
Reviews.Author: Just Me "Customer"
Reviews.Content: I did like this camera, however it broke within the first few days of having it. I returned it back to Amazon, and was refunded the money very quickly. The wifi connectivity is hit or miss too. Spend a few extra dollars and get the Dv150f instead! That's what I did and its a better camera.

Reviews.Title: Great pocket camera with dual view
Reviews.Author: Yu-jin Chia "Yu-Jin Chia"
Reviews.Content: I'll readily admit it- the main reason I got this was to take pictures of myself. Not that I'm narcissistic, but... yeah. Anyway, this is definitely the best camera in its class I've seen.The unit is very compact and light, small enough to fit in anyone's pocket. It's not as thin as some of Sony's offerings, but it's a lot cheaper than any of those. It runs on a Li-Ion power pack that has good battery life and charges fast enough. Recharge is via USB. As noted previously, the main draw of this camera is the front LCD, which although not exactly startling resolution does give you enough of an idea what the picture will look like. This enables you to take arm-length self shots and also lets your subjects see what's going on, if they're close enough to see it.The rear panel non-touch LCD is a generous size and very clear even in bright light, and controls are a standard D-pad. There's a small button on the top to activate the front LCD, and the camera button has a standard zoom ring. The camera has a 5x zoom which is okay- not exactly amazing but about what you'd expect from a digital pocket cam.Pictures come out very clear in native 16 MP resolution and it shoots decent 720P video. It's not a video camera, though, and the quality is about what I'd expect from a phone camera. There's no physical camcorder switch so you have to navigate menus to change modes. I didn't buy it to shoot video, so this doesn't really bother me.Included PC software lets you transfer files. This isn't really necessary, as any PC or Mac comes with software that can do this anyway. The camera itself is also wi-fi enabled, which works fine. This lets you email content or upload it to various social services. Good if you don't need to edit anything and just want t make it immediately available to the whole world.There's some apps that supposedly let you transfer files directly to a phone and use the phone to control the camera remotely. I tried both on my HTC EVO 3D, none of them worked. It looks like it's doing something, but it's either insanely slow or non-functional. I did this more out of curiosity than anything else; from what I know of them, neither of these apps would be particularly useful anyway.The camera has some onboard simple editing modes and a few cute features, like things to take jump shots or play little animations on the front LCD to make kids look at it.All in all, this camera does exactly what I want it to do: take great still pictures with a good shutter speed and not break my arm carrying it around. If you're looking for an enthusiast device or a do-it-all camera/camcorder, this isn't it. But then again, nothing in this price range would be good at that.Pros:Takes great stills, little to no delayWifi enabledGood battery lifeVery portable and compactFront LCD is a unique and useful featureCons:Zoom is pretty weakMediocre video qualityApps don't work

Reviews.Title: wow...amazing!
Reviews.Author: Deborah L. Sutton "DIBBIE"
Reviews.Content: I was looking for a wifi camera that could upload my pictures to Facebook easily and this camera really surprised me with all it has to offer. I connected to my wireless router easily and it remembers the password so you don't have to retype it every time you want to upload a picture. You can also upload to skydriveor email pictures!There are so many settings available... the front screen option of course that let's you take a picture of yourself, which is very nice...but my favorite scene mode is children which pops up an animated video on the screen in the front of the camera to grab the kid's interest...amazing!I've been playing with the camera all day getting used to the controls and it's fairly easy and lots of fun!Picture quality is excellent! I can't believe what you get from this camera for the price...I paid $135 and am very happy!Great camera for teens or anyone! I'm 42!

Reviews.Title: Amazing!
Reviews.Author: haiguiseimcool
Reviews.Content: All I can say is wow. This camera is very high quality and inexpensive. The sound is okay and the pictures come out beautifully. But, if you were to buy this for taking videos, I don't recommend it. It's better to just take pictures with it. Uploading is very fast and easy. MobileLink was hard to use though. Every feature is so cool. I wasn't really sure of buying this before though, because I kept thinking of flaws. If you're looking for a nice, cheap, and easy to use camera but you also want to be able to see yourself, buy this camera.Pros:Nice picturesEasy to useNice designCons:Battery isn't so goodHard to type things inVideo recordings didn't meet expectations

Reviews.Title: Died within a day.
Reviews.Author: PDJ
Reviews.Content: The camera is very nice and the front LCD is amazing. It is invisible until you turn it on. The problem is it died after one day of operation as the zoom jammed. Nothing could get it back to working so I had to return it. Great idea poorly executed!Thank goodness Amazon have a no hassle return policy.

Reviews.Title: Amazing Camera and all the little extras
Reviews.Author: A. Miller
Reviews.Content: I received the camera on Friday. The entire weekend I messed with it. I think this was the best camera purchase i have made in such a long time. The pictures come out amazing. You can use the filters in real time or after you have taken the picture. There are 2 apps for smart phones.. MobileLink (which lets you access the pictures on your camera remotely) and Remote Viewfinder (which lets your smartphone be the screen when taking group pictures). Both of them are awesome. I have the HTC Evo and have no issues with the apps. I continue to find cool features with this camera. I am no professional and this thing makes me feel like I am. Its super easy to use and the menu display gives quick tips on what each icon is for. I could go on and on. BUY THIS CAMERA!!

Reviews.Title: Very Intelligent Camera
Reviews.Author: Melinda L. Rodgers
Reviews.Content: This camera is perfect for those that like to take pictures and share them fast. I love the fact that I can take pictures with it as it is linked to my phone and then share the pictures using my phone internet when WiFi is not available. This is why I bought the camera in the first place because my cell phone camera bit the dust. I also like the fact that you can share pictures to Facebook or other social networks straight from the phone or email them. It also downloads the pictures on to the computer without the cord if WiFi is available or you can plug the cord in either way it downloads quickly. The pictures are of good quality and there are a lot of cool picture filters that you can use while shooting different shots to enhance your photos. The software that comes with the camera is also fun. I used a picture that I had taken and opened it up in the program and was able to transpose a poem that I had written into the pic and print it out and frame it and give to my brother for Christmas. He absolutely loved it. I would definitely recommend this camera to any amateur picture taker that loves to take pictures to remember great memories and share them with friends and family.

Reviews.Title: broke in 1 day
Reviews.Author: Nicole
Reviews.Content: When i first received the camera and began to use it I was thrilled. It has many fantastic feautures than are fun to play with and takes amazing pics. However, the camera broke the following day. I contacted samsung and they stated it happens frequently with this model and could have been because of shipping. I keep my camera in my purse and need a durable long lasting camera. Do not buy if you want a camera to last. I returned it for another samsung model and have started to have problems with this camera as well....

Reviews.Title: For extreme begginers who will spend little time with the camera.
Reviews.Author: Michel Orlow
Reviews.Content: Don't buy if the purpose is long trips and lot on/off usage, because:- Lifetime of the battery energy is short (to use all day)- Resolution is not that much- Is comfort to take pictures with the front view but i'm not sure about the resolution (you need to be very still)- Generally speaking the camera is very very slow. (The shots, video quality is good but very slow to start, is you need something quick, forget it)- Multiple shots (Forget it...super slow)- The Wifi is perfect.- The panoramic shot is perfect too- The child mode is cool (To entertain to look to the camera)- Maybe the price is to high to all this. Depend on what you are looking for.Good luck

Reviews.Title: Love it!!
Reviews.Author: sara Anthony Velasco
Reviews.Content: I bought this to replace my Samsung NV11 that recently died on me after about 5 years of substantial use. Because I loved it so much I decided to look at other Samsung cameras in hopes I could find something that was as good.This camera is definitely great. I love all the features it has especially being able to share photos through wifi. I love that it has all the effects which you can see in real-time before even taking the picture including when adjusting the saturation and contrast!  I tend to lean more toward the programming setting so I can adjust my images with more control, but the effects are fun to experiment and play with.The picture quality isn't as amazing as my NV11, but it's still great. A bit grainy sometimes.Overall this is a great camera with an even better price tag and would fully recommend it especially if your budget is low, but you still want a higher end point and shoot.

Reviews.Title: Good Camera for the price!
Reviews.Author: malibu
Reviews.Content: This camera takes great pictures & has been super easy to use & download pics. I would recommend this camera to my family and or friends. very good buy for the price. I love the dual view screen very fun to use and snap pics

Reviews.Title: Completely worth the price, and extra features that make me love it more.
Reviews.Author: Michael Shao "I like trains"
Reviews.Content: I use this camera as both a main-picture-taker, but also for Vlogging (video blogging) and taking shameless self-pictures when near cool landscape. I got it for $100 incl. shipping and tax; but if it's even closer to $150 I'd still consider it a great contender.The front-side LCD is not present in ANY of today's current cameras, which is frustrating when nobody is around and you want to take a picture of yourself and a friend, or just yourself, to remember a moment. Convenience features such as wi-fi connectivity allow you to upload pictures to Flickr or short video clips to YouTube / Facebook, such that you always stay connected and never too far away from your friends.Let's take a look at some pros/cons.Pros:-- Front-side 1" LCD screen.-- Adjustable lighting profiles for sunny, cloudy, indoor incandescent, etc. (white balance is better for specific shots).-- 720p video recording - with a 32GB card, you can get about 7 hours.-- Battery lasts about 8 hours on a single charge-- Panorama feature is dynamic and flexible to your needs.Cons:-- 16.2MP -- not great for the price (hoping for 18-20MP), but it's a flaw that's worth it because of the pros available.-- Can't do 1080p video recordings. This is unfortunately due to the low resolution on the MP side (16.2MP vs. 18.1MP required for 1080p), but the picture quality is still really good for the cost.-- Sound microphone picks up a lot of background noise if the camera isn't level -- pointing up or down can cause "static wind" to get picked up in the background, making it annoying to deal with when editing later on.Overall, this is an awesome point-and-shoot camera for the price. Given the fact that this isn't meant to do DSLR-like things, I'd recommend this for beginner photographers and those who don't care all that much about resolution of pictures, but still care enough about a decent picture to take one. Definitely recommended to those who want to do video recordings.

Reviews.Title: Had to return it
Reviews.Author: JC
Reviews.Content: I was excited to try this out, but ultimately had to return it.- The camera is small and light. I charged it up and was able to use it around the home for a day. At least in my house, the photos weren't really that impressive. My old Canon PowerShot A530 5MP took better focused pictures.- The wifi connection was pretty weak. My computers are all on WIFI, in various rooms around my home and all get strong signals. This device constantly lost wifi access - it worked best when I sat beside the router.- I only tried the Google picassa upload which worked pretty badly. I had to (a) give my username/password for gmail for it to connect. Not a fan of the security risks this exposes my account to. (b) it would fail with unknown reasons repeatedly uploading 2-3 photos. Eventually I did get it to work, but it wasn't as easy as I had hoped.- The front screen is awesome. It's hidden and you can't even tell there is a screen unless you power it up. I would guess its novel construction would make it so you don't have to worry about scratching it.With all of this said, last week I stuck it in my bag for a concert. At the event, the device would not power up. Holding the power button simply caused its status light to flash green. It was the first time I had taken it anywhere, and then it failed to work. I returned it for a refund after this.

Reviews.Title: Great with one reservation...
Reviews.Author: Amazon Customer
Reviews.Content: This camera does a great job at taking pictures.  I also love the wi-fi and other options.  What I'm not understanding, and the reason I gave the 4-stars is the lack of a lens cover.  I suppose the best thing to do if you get this camera is get a hard shell case...because you'll need it (you can't put the camera - without a lens cover) in your pocket and expect to have a scratch free lens.

Reviews.Title: Love the camera
Reviews.Author: NGOC TRUONG
Reviews.Content: Fast shipping. The camera is actually very easy to use. A lot of photoshop functions and good flash. It was very light and fit perfectly in my purse

Reviews.Title: Amazing Camera!
Reviews.Author: Danielle abreu
Reviews.Content: This is the second Samsung camera I have purchased and I am so glad that i did.  I have gone through many Olympus, Sony, Canon, Nikon, and Panasonic, and Samsung has been the best.  The picture quality is AAAAmazing, and the features on the camera are phenomenal.  There is a kid's setting that plays a cartoon on the front LED to get them to smile and it works EVERY time.  The panorama setting is great. The jump shot feature has a count down so that you can take jumping pictures as well as setting up a shot that you want to be included in. There is a portait setting that allows you to choose how much retouching you want done while processing, so it can be very detailed or a little blended to hide wrinkles and fine lines.  And this is just the tip on the iceberg. You can adjust the shutter speed right for night shots right on the main screen.  All features are labeled and easy to maneuver around.  I am not a techy by any means, but this camera is like the MAC computer of cameras with its people friendly system.

Reviews.Title: perfect camera
Reviews.Author: julia
Reviews.Content: The camera was everything I expected. The picture are crstal clear. I didn't notice a delay in the shutter time like some reviews say. The camera is small and compact so it makes ot easy to carry around with you. I love this camera so muc! It does take a micro sd card so purchase one with your camera.

Reviews.Title: Cool camera, but lacks basics
Reviews.Author: Ron
Reviews.Content: Samsung is notorious for this when it comes to all of their products: they have some of the coolest features, but neglect some of the most basic tasks.  This camera's coolest feature is by far the front LCD display.  You can't see it in the photo, but just under the Samsung logo on the front of the camera, there is a screen that lights up and allows you to see what's being taken.However, the downside of this camera is the menu.  For a camera that has arrow keys, it basically makes you use every button on it to navigate the device.  Sometimes the arrow keys work, other times you use Home to exit, sometimes you use Menu to exit.  Then, you may have to use the button on top to change screens.  It's really confusing and inconvenient.  I have no idea what Samsung was thinking.The Wi-Fi option is pretty cool.  It allows you to upload photos directly to Facebook, Picasa, Photobucket and Flickr (I think).  You can also upload directly to a phone or a PC for those looking to move photos to newer social networking sites like Vine or Instagram.  It seems to work fairly well and quickly.  I used it with my phone and they had no problems finding each other.  It did require me to download a Samsung app on my phone though.I bought this camera for Mother's Day for my girlfriend and she's not very tech savvy.  It will take tons of explaining to her on how to use the camera simply because Samsung puts little thought into their products when it comes to basic users.The photo takes pretty good photos, 15 megapixels (which no one in their right mind would ever use unless they wanted a wall-sized photo) and 5x optical zoom, which is pretty lame by today's standards.  At $100, I would normally recommend this camera for a basic user, but giving how difficult it is to use, then I can't recommend it for basic users.  If you're a tech savvy person, then you will probably want a camera with more zoom capabilities, so I can't recommend it to you either.I would suggest just waiting on another camera that does similar things.  The front-facing LCD is by far the coolest part of this camera and if anyone else does it, then go with them.

Reviews.Title: Excellent!!!
Reviews.Author: Laurel
Reviews.Content: Very good and complete camera. I can conected my Samsung Galaxy S3 and my camera for better results, share and easier taking pictures. High quality pictures & videos, funny & artistics effects. I can share directly from camera with WiFi. Battery life is not too long, but recharge is quick & easy. Conclusion: One of the best purchase I ever made! I love it!

Reviews.Title: An incredible $100 camera
Reviews.Author: Teflon Don
Reviews.Content: The Samsung DV300F is the culmination of everything any social websiting person could want. With Wifi connectivity and a front sided screen, it is the pinnacle of creating facebook memories.I'm a semi-professional photographer, so I have a pretty good grasp on what to look for in a camera when I decided to get one for my girlfriend for her birthday. And this fits the bill perfectly.Pros:+Front facing camera+Incredible variety of shooting modes+Wifi and social media connectability+Slick black Samsung design+Very lightNegatives:-Its light weight also makes it feel a bit flimsy-The flash is terrible (as expected in almost all point and shoots)-The lag between pictures can be frustratingOverall:My girlfriend doesn't need a complex camera, and she's not interested in fussing over shutter speed, aperture, or ISO. She cares if she can easily take a picture with her friends and upload it to facebook. This camera is the best thing I've ever seen when it comes to that.Logging into the Wifi and then to facebook is quick and easy. The only negative is you can only upload 20 pictures at a time to facebook. It's also not exactly the fastest thing in the world to do. But I'm still amazed at the fact you can even connect to facebook off a camera!The front facing camera is incredibly useful when taking pictures with friends. You'll never cut off someone's head again!Bottom Line:------------------------For $100-$125, you get a 16mp camera with a front facing screen and wifi connectability, and for that you can't go wrong.

Reviews.Title: best i ever had
Reviews.Author: gstar
Reviews.Content: i wont buy other til this one break.so simple to connect with my samsung galaxy.same charger with my phone.the most i like about it: is the photo editor.i become more handsome with this camera lol..

Reviews.Title: high utility 'smartness', shaky connectivity
Reviews.Author: LionKing "bas"
Reviews.Content: 2 best things I liked about this camera: 1. front LCD screen and 2. video animation that engages kids while u take their smiley snaps. the video clip play on the front LCD and u can really get the results that you would have never gotten otherwise especially when shooting infants and toddlers.1 thing that I did not like about it was its unreliable wifi connectivity. pics do not upload to cyberspace easily. needs multiple attempts. otherwise it is a technological miracle in the amateur world

Reviews.Title: changed my first review
Reviews.Author: golfsupt
Reviews.Content: I have never seen such bad web support and manual instructions that are so terrible. Taking the camera back. No wonder its so cheap.********************" My first review was "setup is a nightmare" The directions are terrible BUT the end result after 5 days of setting up for Wi-FI this camera is AWESOME make sure you read and understand functions It has ALLOT of FEATURES. Thumbs up!!!!!!!!

Reviews.Title: Great Camera but Needs a Memory Card
Reviews.Author: fantasyquill
Reviews.Content: I bought this for my daughter and forgot to get a memory card for it.  She loves it, though, and loves that she can change the view of the camera to take pictures of herself with her friends.  There's also a cool "kid" mode that plays a cartoon on the front to get a child's attention when taking their picture... works great for pets, too!

Reviews.Title: Great Birthday Gift
Reviews.Author: Patricia
Reviews.Content: I bought this camera as a surprise birthday gift for my boyfriend because he loved my camera which is similar.  He absolutely loved it and was fascinated by all the features and great picture quality.  Plus it is a "smart" camera which means you can email pics from the camera.  He just purchased a "smart" flatscreen tv so I wanted to add to his "smart" collection.  Great buy!

Reviews.Title: nice camera
Reviews.Author: enigma1313
Reviews.Content: Great camera. 2nd one I got for my wife and works really well. I recommend it for the casual camera user.

Reviews.Title: Great fun Camera
Reviews.Author: Pelicanpat
Reviews.Content: This really a nice camera, WiFi, apps, etc, so many things you can do right on the camera with your pictures,The Video is excellent quality and picture quality is the same. Using it all the time. I have a larger SLR camera but use this one more often, Great for self portrait with front view display! I bought another for my sister!

Reviews.Title: Very satisfactory
Reviews.Author: C. N. Moore
Reviews.Content: This camera arrived nicely boxed and packed and a day or two sooner than expected for the free shipping.I got it primarily for easy uploading of pictures  to Facebook or Picasa and it works perfectly.  The WiFi connection is fast and the pictures are very good for an inexpensive camera.Navigation through the settings is somewhat confusing and for my eyes the icons are very tiny.  The included "Getting started" manual is minimal - but there is a very thorough PDF manual available at [...]I'm well satisfied with it.

Reviews.Title: Great features, great price!
Reviews.Author: Austra Zubkovs
Reviews.Content: This has a been a great camera for me so far with a lot of neat features. The front LCD screen, beauty mode, and jump shot mode are cool. You can do some basic photo editing right inside the camera too. The battery life has been excellent and it's small and easy to carry around.My only major drawback: the default mode is "Smart Mode," and not a basic Auto mode. So it's constantly trying to analyze my photo to determine the best function instead of just letting me snap a quick picture. Great for if I want to take a quick macro photo, or am in a dark setting. Not so great when I just want to quickly take a group photo.Overall: what a great quality camera for such an inexpensive price. With next day shipping I still got it for about $150.

Reviews.Title: LOVE LOVE LOVE!!
Reviews.Author: Kayla
Reviews.Content: My boyfriend surprised me with this camera for my birthday in june. I love it! there are so many functions! for kids, and beauty and different flashes. not to mention the lcd on the front is amazing! i have 2 apps on my android for this camera. one will sync pics from the camera to my inspire and the other is kind of like a button to take photos. hard to explain. but i am so in love!! 5 STARS!

Reviews.Title: Great price greatest functionality
Reviews.Author: Danrock
Reviews.Content: Simple high quality camera, very light weight.. confortable, good look. The front LCD it's just amazing!!!All the effects, the definition of the photo its really good for a pocket camera. Im realy happy with this product

Reviews.Title: Takes very good pictures
Reviews.Author: Dustin Fogt
Reviews.Content: I bought this camera for my wife as a birthday gift.  I think her favorite feature is the dual display and facial recognition.  The dual display makes it easy to take perfect self portraits and the facial recognition ensures that your pictures come out perfect every time.  I compared this camera to many other cameras and feel this is much better than many cameras that sell for twice as much

Reviews.Title: Great Camera
Reviews.Author: E Rice
Reviews.Content: I love this camera.  This camera takes great pictures and there are many cool features as well.  I love the front LCD screen which make self portrait very easy to snap.  The wifi feature is another cool feature as well but it does take a long time to upload.  The best thing about the camera is the internal battery which I was able to take 235 pictures before recharging.

Reviews.Title: awesome camera
Reviews.Author: megzrenee
Reviews.Content: I Saw this camera in stores and had to have it. I absolutely love it! I did have a problem with Samsung never packaged a battery but I called them and everything was fixed immediately. I recommend this camera to anyone!

Reviews.Title: Could not get wifi feature to work properly
Reviews.Author: jerseyJD "Dee"
Reviews.Content: This camera is very attractive and I wanted it mainly because of the wifi feature (although the portrait function is cool, too).  I have a Cisco Valet router and, no matter how hard I tried, I could not get pictures to upload to Facebook or e-mail from this device.  The camera would connect to wifi without a problem, but would freeze up every time I tried to send an e-mail or connect to Facebook.  I was so disappointed.  Even tried making sure drivers were up to date on both the camera and the router, but to no avail.  I don't know if I got a bad camera or what.  If the wifi had worked, I would have kept it - no question.  But since you can get non-wifi cameras with the same specs for less, I had to return.

Reviews.Title: screen completely damaged after taking pictures in snowy weather
Reviews.Author: Siyi Zhang
Reviews.Content: The self-portrait mode works great before it broke two months later..I'm very unsatisfied. it doesn't even touch the snow. I so wish I didn't buy it.

Reviews.Title: amended review-latest update fix problem
Reviews.Author: M. Lynch
Reviews.Content: The apps are in the itunes app store, but do not work.  If you are buying for the remote viewfinder feature and are an Iphone user, stay away.  Pics and video are good. ***The latest firmware update seems to have fixed problem with iphone.  Transfers pics to iphone easily once you get the phone and the camera connected. The remote viewfinder app does what it's supposed to do--the image is a little dark on the iphone and the response time to take a picture is a little slow, but it works.  It maybe the cool thing I was hoping it would be.

Reviews.Title: Awesome Camera - best thing is the dual view.
Reviews.Author: Papillon Chic
Reviews.Content: This is a super cool camera, especially if you are a person that wants to take pix of [herself] and friends and has to keep taking additional photos till you get just the right angle! haha.  Price was great too.  It's not a "top of the top" camera, but it exceeds expectations of a $150 purchase for sure :)

Reviews.Title: Not so great
Reviews.Author: Nelu
Reviews.Content: Slow shutter response and requires too much distance to focus. Other than this, it seems to be a good camera for low budget. Suitable for beginers that do not have high expectations from a budget camera.

Reviews.Title: Broke within 2 weeks
Reviews.Author: Steven Parker
Reviews.Content: I loved the camera except for one obvious flaw.  When in the flash mode, it would take seconds(!) to take a photo - way too long!  Then, after about 2 weeks, the screen went blank and I had to send it back to Samsung for repair. I'm waiting for Samsung to repair it.  We'll see.

Reviews.Title: awesome camera
Reviews.Author: Luiggi Restivo
Reviews.Content: Fabulous camera its simple to use and i like photos and videos i love it clearly i recomend all people

Reviews.Title: Love my camera
Reviews.Author: V. W. M. "VMWM"
Reviews.Content: Light. Easy to operate. Does everything I want a camera to do and more. Highly recommend it for travel and compactness.

Reviews.Title: I love it
Reviews.Author: eDUARDO p.
Reviews.Content: camera is wonderful

Reviews.Title: Love this camera
Reviews.Author: Aunt_Sukki
Reviews.Content: I love this camera. The features are great. The quality is great. THe best part is the front view for selfies!

Reviews.Title: Awesome
Reviews.Author: danagirl
Reviews.Content: This is the best camera I have ever had. It takes very clear pictures and has lots of cool tools to play around with for neat pictures.

Reviews.Title: It's okay
Reviews.Author: Tracy R. Strange "Mommy3"
Reviews.Content: I just received this camera about two weeks ago and I have been using it a lot to get familiar with it.It doesn't always take clear shots even when you are holding very still.  Some of them are blurry and I have to retake the picture.So that is what I am most disappointed about.  I read all the reviews and was expecting a camera that didn't take blurry pictures.Also, the Zoom doesn't go far.  So if you want to take pictures of things farther than a cars length away, this isn't the camera for you.It is pretty cool how it shows a little cartoon in the Child mode.  But the cartoon is extremely short and repeats over and over.  It gets really annoying really fast.  So if you are taking a lot of pictures of kids, you'll get tired of it quickly.  It needs at least 3 different cartoons to show to make it great.The lighting is slightly off too.  You can take a picture with the flash and it still comes out looking a little dark.  It's not always that way though.  It's a 50/50 chance the picture is going to come out good. My big 14 Mega Pixel camera is a lot better than this one.  But after a year and a half it started having problems that's why I purchased this one.I spent too much money on this camera for it not to work like I was expecting it to. I'm going to have to buy another camera as soon as I get the money.

Reviews.Title: Awesome
Reviews.Author: Pgirl
Reviews.Content: This is an AWESOME camera.  Took it all the way to Nigeria with me and it gave me some beautiful photos and some great video footage

Reviews.Title: Awesome
Reviews.Author: Amanda M. Dunaway
Reviews.Content: I own a coiled of slr cameras but this is a great one to take on the go. Compact and love the front display!

Reviews.Title: Good camera
Reviews.Author: Alix Wilson "Ali"
Reviews.Content: I like it but still trying to figure out setting and play around with it.. Will update in a couple minutes anyone have suggestions or tutorials? Lol

Reviews.Title: Return trouble
Reviews.Author: Erick Houde
Reviews.Content: Item arrived very quickly.  The problem was it did not work.  They tried to get me to pay to have it returned, but after  a little discussion they eventually offered a free return.  That should have been automatic.

Reviews.Title: Wanted to Love It
Reviews.Author: Amazon Customer
Reviews.Content: The front view is great, but that's about it. As others have stated, the camera started having issues within a couple months, slow loading when buttons were pushed, would take forever to actually take a picture, and the zoom lever would jam. I'm so disappointed because I really love the front view, and so does my kiddo (I actually get smiles because he can see himself), but that is the only thing I love and the only thing that's good on this camera for taking pictures of kids. It's impossible to quickly switch back and forth from camera to camcorder so a lot of moments are missed and it doesn't have a burst setting so you get screwed a lot. Also, after taking one picture, it takes forever to process and be ready to take another one. I wish other cameras that allow you to quickly switch from camera to camcorder and have the burst setting would get the dual-view feature, it's pretty handy, but not worth the money when this camera struggles as it does so much.P.S.The I could never get the wi-fi to work. Even when it said it was connected, it couldn't ever actually post or email the pictures etc... it just kept choking. Luckily I didn't really care about that so it wasn't THAT big of a deal, but if that entices you, you have been warned.

Reviews.Title: perfect
Reviews.Author: Manuel Sanz
Reviews.Content: Completely satisfied with the product purchase. Excellent quality and speed when sending the article. I recommend it. I have tested and reviewed the product and I have not had anything that disappoint.

Reviews.Title: Camera
Reviews.Author: Judie
Reviews.Content: Exactly what my grandaughter wanted for her birthday. A little higher in price Thani found elsewhere but they were sold out!

Reviews.Title: Wi-fi half of the time
Reviews.Author: Sun K.
Reviews.Content: It's suppose to be a Wi-fi camera but I'm only able to post pics online half of the time. Other than that, it's a great camera. I love the front facing screen. It's so convenient.

Reviews.Title: GREAT CAMERA
Reviews.Author: red88lx
Reviews.Content: GREAT CAMERA BOUGHT IT FOR MY WIFE SHE LOVES IT AND BELIEVE ME SHE TAKES A LOT OF PICTURES EASY TO USE AND SET UP

Reviews.Title: shipped fast
Reviews.Author: julie
Reviews.Content: I love the camera, works very good, takes pictures very fast. It also has a thing on the camera to make the kids laugh..

Reviews.Title: Purchased as gift
Reviews.Author: Young NYer 10
Reviews.Content: I purchased this camera as a gift for someone who had the same camera but the previous model. The screen in front is a great feature but requires a learning curve. They loved the previous model so I purchased this one for them when they dropped their old one and broke it. The WiFi feature is nice and the camera performs good for the price I paid for it. If you are expecting to get a professional camera for the this price then look elsewhere. It has basic functions for the everyday user or someone young in need of a camera. Quality of pictures is nice and like stated before for the price you cant complain. I would buy again.

Reviews.Title: Awesome
Reviews.Author: Elda Casillas
Reviews.Content: Samsung products are just great! This camera is not only light and filled with great features, the quality of the pictures are SWEET!

Reviews.Title: One hundred percent grateful.
Reviews.Author: Deybis Ordoñez
Reviews.Content: It is a most excellent product quality, recommend it to all users and customers of Amazon. thank you very much

Reviews.Title: Compact, easy to operate, fair price
Reviews.Author: Jean Iguatemy "Jean"
Reviews.Content: I first bought a dual view Samsung camera a couple of years ago for a family member. She liked so much that her sister asked me to bring her one. They both enjoy the front little screen for self-shots, how easy is to operate this camera and the compact size of it. Fair price too.

Reviews.Title: I LOVE MY NEW ACQUISITION
Reviews.Author: Gabriela Martinez
Reviews.Content: I'M REALLY SUPER CONFORMING, EXCELLENT CAMERA, HAS MANY FEATURES ... I AM DELIGHTED WITH THE PRODUCT ... I would give 10 STAR BUT THERE IS ONLY OPTION FOR 5 ...

Reviews.Title: Excellent Buy
Reviews.Author: S. F. Galeano
Reviews.Content: This camera is...Small,Cheap,Easy to use,Great resolutionComes with many features & the computer software is easy to use..YEAH!  I like it a lot.

Reviews.Title: Great little camera!
Reviews.Author: Gail
Reviews.Content: I really enjoy this camera.  It is easy to use and I like all the features it offers.  Pictures come out very good.

Reviews.Title: Very Happy
Reviews.Author: Jessica Millan
Reviews.Content: Good Looking Camera it was Very Nice and I Love It Thank You Im very Happy with My New Camera!

Reviews.Title: Terrific Samsung Camera
Reviews.Author: Someone54
Reviews.Content: This is a fantastic camera. I'm really impressed of what you can do to a photo by just using this camera. Plus, it seems that this Samsung is friendly to the likes of New 32gb Micro Sd Card Sdhc Tf Flash Memory Card 32gb Class 10, New! Usa!. Overall, outstanding camera. I recommend if you are a fan of photography.

Reviews.Title: Very Good
Reviews.Author: Beatriz Duri
Reviews.Content: Thank youYou can send quality photos from the party directly from the camera via email to social network sites like Facebook. Easily connect and share from any public Wi-Fi hotspot using the camera's log-in browser. Upload and store cool images and video directly from the camera to Microsoft Skydive and access your uploaded content on supported connected devices via All Share Play.

Reviews.Title: fun and compact!
Reviews.Author: carla j ferrel
Reviews.Content: Takes a bit of reading to get going.  Pictures are very good, but not as good as a better camera.  Nice to keep in your pocket!

Reviews.Title: discontent
Reviews.Author: Jhon Jairo Cañate
Reviews.Content: product purchased in this store I get my hands condefectos I only lasted two weeks of use is jhon Canate from Venezuela

Reviews.Title: Great!
Reviews.Author: D. Louie
Reviews.Content: Bought this as a gift for my in-laws.  It's nice and works well, it's super functional and very user friendly.  The user-friendly part was probably the most important aspect because they don't adjust to technology well.  Surprisingly, they really like the dual-view feature the most.  Great, simple point & shoot camera.

Reviews.Title: Great For The Money
Reviews.Author: Frankie Chanhnoy
Reviews.Content: Great product didn't see anything wrong except for a few minor things. Took pictures smoothly just wasn't so pretty at low lighting situations that also goes for recording. While recording in dark places the FPS drops for some reason. But above any of those minor things its a great camera.

Reviews.Title: Samsung DV300F
Reviews.Author: Chung Joe
Reviews.Content: Originally purchased as a gift for a relative. I was so impressed with the clarity and excellent capabilities of the camera, my relative got something different as a gift.

Reviews.Title: Great Features
Reviews.Author: Brent
Reviews.Content: This product Has wonderful Features.  The app feature was a little hard to figure out at first and sometimes it doesn't always work.  But the camera takes excellent pictures and has lots of features you can't find on other camers.

Reviews.Title: Love this camera.
Reviews.Author: Gina M. Ferrara
Reviews.Content: The best camera I have had in a long time. I love the front screen feature. Pretty cool for those fb pictures.

Reviews.Title: A gift for mom
Reviews.Author: michelle T
Reviews.Content: I bought this as a Mother's Day gift for my mom and I knew she would love it but she loved it more than I could even imagine. Everyday since Mother's Day I have got a phone call about a new feature she has found on the camera.  The children's mode is a life saver.  Quick delivery & great product, what more could you ask for?

Reviews.Title: Very good product at low price
Reviews.Author: Dario Walter Valero
Reviews.Content: I ha bought this camera to my daughter, I have a Nikon D5100, along our vacations we used more the Samsung DV300F insted of Nikon.

Reviews.Title: present for myself
Reviews.Author: num1steelergirl
Reviews.Content: Love this camera!! I have a two year old daughter that's always on the go and its  so hard to catch her for the camera but this camera has a children feature that plays cool animations in the front. Now I can take a picture with Both mg children not just one! Lol

Reviews.Title: Nice
Reviews.Author: juan carlos
Reviews.Content: Everything was right and excellent product. Thank you for all, i am very happy for this buy. Keep on that way

Reviews.Title: Awesome Camera with Great Features
Reviews.Author: cdw118
Reviews.Content: My girlfriend and I bought this camera to use when we traveled through Europe. It worked great! The camera has multiple modes including smart-photo, smart-video, and panoramic. The front-view LCD screen was one of our favorite features. It allowed us to take self-photos in front of landmarks without always having to ask someone to take the picture for us. Our one complaint was that we had difficulty getting the camera to upload pictures to the internet unless the wifi in the area was incredibly strong. It worked at home in our apartment, but in local places like Starbucks it did not work.

Reviews.Title: Love it.
Reviews.Author: Bet
Reviews.Content: Got this Camera as a gift I love it, it has some really great features I use it all the time Great camera  love the Wi-Fi  :)

Reviews.Title: awesome camera!
Reviews.Author: Matt & Lavon
Reviews.Content: great options and picture quality! love the fact that I dont need to buy batteries, just plug it in to charge it. Great buy!

Reviews.Title: buen producto
Reviews.Author: Freddy
Reviews.Content: saludo desde venezuela muy recomendado producto es exelente gracias me encanta espero poder comprar otro en las siguientes oportunidades mas

Reviews.Title: I love it
Reviews.Author: mandy moe
Reviews.Content: This camera can be used in so many ways. It connects to Facebook to upload pictures and videos. You can email them to people in your family that's not close by. It was a good price fore what I was looking for. I bought one for myself and my mother-in-law and she loves it. I recommend it to anyone.

Reviews.Title: Plenty of selection to use the function
Reviews.Author: Gina
Reviews.Content: I don't need all the functions in this camera. It seems more complicated than the older version. I prefer the older model than this new one.

Reviews.Title: One of the best!
Reviews.Author: kiki
Reviews.Content: This camera is extremely lightweight, the colour and focus is great, its user friendly, the children's setting is amazing! It's a totally awesome buy. The one thing I didn't like is the fact that it's not a touchscreen, however, for the price its a great buy!!!

Reviews.Title: Like it
Reviews.Author: maricela lopez
Reviews.Content: I like this product but it said it came with a micro card shp thing but it don't come with it but love I use it for pic

Reviews.Title: MY FIRST DAY WITH THIS CAMERA
Reviews.Author: Mylinh nguyen
Reviews.Content: IM LOVING THIS SO FAR!!!!!!!!PICTURES COME OUT BEAUTIFULLYLOOOOOVVEEEEEEE ITTTTbut ive only had this for a day so i dont know much about it yet butfirst impression: AMAZING CAMERA FOR THE PRICE INDEEDalso, shipping was SUPERD!!!i got amazon prime and this took a day to get to me!SUPER FAST!!!!!*UPDATE*My second day with the camera, i noticed the battery went down like crazy even though i barely touch the thing!A bit upset at how fast the battery dies but still very satisfied with the camera

Reviews.Title: samsung dv300f
Reviews.Author: Claudia Retamozo
Reviews.Content: toma fotos y mucho fotos. cualquier lugar mañanana tarde, noche y anoche. todos fotos estan muy milagroso y perfecto! yo estoy tan loca tomando fotos!! Q traviesura soy! je

Reviews.Title: More than Excellent!
Reviews.Author: Omar Ramirez Rosario
Reviews.Content: Honestly, to tell you the true, this would be the best camera I've ever bought, this is an amazing camera but what I like most its the screen in front it makes to take pictures of myself so easy, my friend was speechless when she saw the HD of my pictures, the ''high definition'' in pictures and videos is incredible! I honestly recommend it to all those people who likes to take pictures with a very good quality !!!

Reviews.Title: Good camera for the price
Reviews.Author: EB
Reviews.Content: This is a good straight-forward point and shoot camera. Nothing top end, but definitely not the bottom of the barrel either. Plus, I got it for $105 and for that price it's a great buy. Nice black case, very slim and pocketable as well. The front screen is cool, but honestly pretty useless unless you're a selfie junkie. My only complaint is that it is slightly slow. Takes a couple seconds to charge the flash when you turn it on and focus the camera and takes a second or so in between pictures to recharge the flash so if you're a rapid picture snapper or taking quick action shots...this might not be the camera for you. Otherwise this is a great buy and should keep you happy.

Reviews.Title: Awesome for solo trips and couple pics
Reviews.Author: wormdivision
Reviews.Content: This is a sweet camera. I wanted this when it first came out but now since the price has gone down i got one. Got one for the wife too as she liked it when i showed it to her.16mp takes great shots. It has awesome in camera effects for pics and video. It records awesome hd with a few audio options. Its a smart camera meaning i can connect through wifi to my ipad or tv or computer to transfer/view pics. Love not having to use a usb cable. You can also get apps on your smartphone/ipad to interact with it such as a remote shutter/viewer and to transfer pics.The zoom isnt much but its there. But get to know digital.16mp images look great so use your optical zoom not digital zoom then zoom into and crop your image.The front viewscreen is the main reason i wanted this and separates it from almost all others. I travel from time to time and recently went to long beach. I knew i would be alone and wanted my pic taken in front of the light house there. Its also good for when the wife and i are out and want our pic taken together.

Reviews.Title: High quality camera
Reviews.Author: Linda Garland
Reviews.Content: I bought it as a gift my daughter and this camera is incredible! The quality, ease of use and its wireless capabilities make this camera the best ever.

Reviews.Title: great camera
Reviews.Author: RICH ABT
Reviews.Content: Got this for my girlfriend for x-mas, she loves it..has a great zoom, takes nice pictures...very slim, and the front screen rocks!!

Reviews.Title: Awesome Camera!
Reviews.Author: Jesler G. Garcia Rojas "jesler"
Reviews.Content: This is the first digital camera that I absolutely love!. The screen size is great and I like the screen in front so you can see what you are looking at when in front of the camera, the features that this camera has are endless, My nieces love the self shot feature. I love the fact that I can send pictures or HD movies to everyone instantly on facebook, twitter or email to family that lives far away. Easy to use and it takes very clear and beautiful pictures.If anyone is in the market for a camera, get this one, it is priced amazingly cheap and I promise you will not be disappointed!!!! If you are buying it as a gift for someone, you will be labeled the best gift giver EVER!!!!! Do not wait go get one so you can have endless memories for any event!Thanks Samsung for an amazing camera!!!!!!!!Pros: Bright display, Inexpensive, wi-fi, Easy to use, Realistic color, Lightweight

Reviews.Title: My awesome camera
Reviews.Author: Sharon Russell
Reviews.Content: I bought this for myself. The main feature I considered was the front view screen so you can see yourself  before and while taking a picture of yourself. Samsung is a brand that is well known and that I trust and I am more than happy with my camera. It is very user friendly and I would urge anyone considering buying a camera to consider this one. Very reasonably priced for the quality.

Reviews.Title: Awesome!
Reviews.Author: Shelita
Reviews.Content: Pics are clear and beautiful! I only brought the camera for my best friend wedding but i use the camera for everything!

Reviews.Title: good
Reviews.Author: herve pugin
Reviews.Content: very good product, come in time at a good price. works good, I'm to buy this product. I will recommend it

Reviews.Title: good but not perfect - apps just available for Samsung (Android) devices
Reviews.Author: Dirk E.
Reviews.Content: The camera itself - even just having a 5x focus (here I do prefer 12-18x) - is doing a great job.The front display - why I bought it to make photos of my wife and myself while on the go - is perfect.The only disadvantage is the menu of the camera. There's no wheel to quickly change the settings.So you're not able to quickly switch from "Smart Auto" to "Smart Film" or "Scene" among others.Also the "Mobile Link" (to link with a Smartphone) just works with Samsung smartphones. Same for"Remote Viewfinder" (shows a preview of the picture on a Smartphone) app is only available for Samsung."Social Media" offers options to connect with "facebook", "Picasa", "Youtube" and "Photobucket". Not more!Email let you send emails. "Cloud" offers uploads to "skyDrive" (no Dropbox among others is available)!The pictures itself are very good. So I would give the camera a 5-stars if there's a app for not only aSamsung but ALL smartphones (Android, Apple and Windows Phone). And a better zoom is appreciated!

Reviews.Title: Where's Burst Mode?
Reviews.Author: Kiim
Reviews.Content: I looked at the instruction manual on PDF before buying this camera and in the manual it says there is a "Burst Mode" for "capturing fast-moving subjects."  However, now that I have the camera I have discovered that the instructions for how to access this mode are completely incorrect.  And now I'm wondering if there is a burst mode available at all on the camera (if there is I can't find it).  Beware if you are needing a camera to take action shots because as I've said the manual is incorrect.

Reviews.Title: Review
Reviews.Author: Janice Anderson
Reviews.Content: This product does everything I want, my only concern is that I would have liked to have a printed manual instead of a disk

Reviews.Title: Does anything u could imagine
Reviews.Author: Julie
Reviews.Content: I have HAD to get a new camera every year or 5 yrs bc someone always steals them :( I don't mind having to get a new one BUT they could at least leave me the memory card bc some pics u can never get back.  Ne ways out of all the cameras I have had this one is my fav.!!! The things u can do on it is endless.  The screen on the front is one of my fav features it makes taking a pic by ur self super easy!!

Reviews.Title: I will never buy another Samsung camera again
Reviews.Author: jennifer
Reviews.Content: This is a nice little camera, and it takes decent shots. I needed a front view camera, and honestly there aren't a lot of options out there, so I took a leap and bought this one. Well, I've had it for 3 months, and the camera now won't turn on. It is clearly a battery or charging cord issue, but even after several hours dealing with support at Samsung (who basically just tried the "take out the battery and put it back in" diagnosis) I was told I have to send it in. AT MY EXPENSE. So now, not only do I lose several weeks of using the camera for my business, I get to pay to ship it back and possibly more if they deem it do be my fault.This camera is not worth the trouble. I'll go back to my Canons, and hope that I get a good shot without the front view.

Reviews.Title: Satisfação integral.
Reviews.Author: ADILSON ALVES RIBEIRO DUARTE
Reviews.Content: Estou muito satisfeito pelo atendimento, pela entrega rápida e confiável e pelo produto em si. Recomendo. Minha esposa não para de usar. Sou do Brasil,comprei a partir daqui via internet e uma pessoa minha recebeu nos EUA e trouxe quando voltou pra cá.

Reviews.Title: muy muy bueno
Reviews.Author: alberto roa
Reviews.Content: esta camara es una belleza muy buenas fotos y excelente tomascien por ciento garantizada para fotografos profesionales y aficionados

Reviews.Title: Excelent
Reviews.Author: Victor M Chavez
Reviews.Content: The main advantage is its wifi capability, works perfect, very easy to publish pictures in Facebook, send emails when you have wifi communication.You can always appear in a group picture using the auto shoot function, and the countdown timer, works perfect.Excellent quality in pictures. Micro SD card is a great advantage. Communication with your TV set to view your albums is great.

Reviews.Title: Samsung DV300F Dual View Smart Camera - Black (EC-DV300FBPBUS)
Reviews.Author: Deborah Carroll
Reviews.Content: I was surprised how small this camera is, but my son loves it and the cool features on it, like a screen in front and in back, and the ability to email photos from the camera itself.

Reviews.Title: Great affordable camera.
Reviews.Author: Kevin Andersen
Reviews.Content: This point and shoot takes beautiful pics and I do like the ability to share directly to facebook or email using built in wifi.

Reviews.Title: easy to use
Reviews.Author: K. Kastl
Reviews.Content: small compact camera, ease of use and takes great pictures. Have not used all the features. more to come but for right now I am happy with the purchase.

Reviews.Title: It is not functioning well at all, did not take good pictures
Reviews.Author: Enoabasi Iyoho
Reviews.Content: it is not good at all. Cannot takes good pictures.  all the picyures taken are forggy. i charge the whole day but the cammara completele gone when after 2 minute am going to return it. it was a total disappiontment on my sister's wedding

Reviews.Title: Great
Reviews.Author: Laxjillie22
Reviews.Content: I love this camera.  The dual screen is really fun to use.  I bought this camera for my mom because she loves taking pictures of the new baby.  It's also super easy to email and post pictures to Facebook.

Reviews.Title: I love it
Reviews.Author: Sexy Money
Reviews.Content: I got this camera for a great price and I love it . next time let a person know that it would be a different color.

Reviews.Title: Piece of junk! period
Reviews.Author: westcoast_veggie
Reviews.Content: I checked in advance to see if it was compatible with MAC.  It was in part.However the key feature I wanted it for of transferring via wi-fi does not work with a MAC OSX system.  I got this after contacting Samsung online chat support.  The camera will be returned through no fault of the seller.

Reviews.Title: Dual?  Isn't that means two???
Reviews.Author: TJ
Reviews.Content: Last december 2012 I ordered Samsung DV300F "Dual" View Smart Camera - Black (EC-DV300FBPBUS), It was a present to my syster..... so I received the camera in time for my trip to Venezuela....  I kind of check that the box and it's specifications, I openned to make sure the camera was in it. My surprise when I gave it to my syster it did not have the front view... it had the square marked for it but that was it. to late for me to return it since I was in Venezuela alrerady.

Reviews.Title: excellent product
Reviews.Author: Jesus Pernia
Reviews.Content: Very good price and quality product very happy with purchase thank you very muchexcellent product excellent material for easy grip and handling

Reviews.Title: Picture Quality is not good
Reviews.Author: Ali
Reviews.Content: I have had this camera for about 4 months now and I honestly can say the picture quality is not good. Especially considering the 16.1 Mega pixels of this camera. I have taken about 200 photos and had only 15 of them clear. I do not like the picture quality so I am not sure how to rate this camera. Now, this camera does come with many features such as Wifi and built in software it is fun to play around with it. However, bottom line is the picture quality is unsatisfactory for me. So I will give it a 3 star and probably will never buy another Samsung camera.

Reviews.Title: I Love It!
Reviews.Author: Genevieve
Reviews.Content: Pictures-The dual view makes it easy for taking self shots and for getting little children's attention. They come out clear & at great quality. The settings are amazing, editing, theres tons to play around with - spit shots, jump shots, filters and the list goes on.Video-The dual view also works while recording videos so its perfect for vlogging. Shots in HD so that amazing. Records sounds well too.Overall-Tiny and compact, light, sleek design. Its truly great for its price. I recommend it. Great picture quality, video, amazing selection of modes, zoom is great, microphone is great. Can connect to wifi for instant uploads to Facebook ect. Only problem i have is changing settings. If i want to switch from video to picture, i'd have to go to the menu and select the setting. but no big deal still love it.Oh but the way i received my camera scared me a bit. I received it in a poorly packaged box. Actually i wouldn't call it a box because the sides were really well put together, i could see the camera and reach in just like that. i'm surprised the camera wasn't broken when i got it.

Reviews.Title: great deal and the product, as a point and shoot its capturing some great pictures.
Reviews.Author: Heidi
Reviews.Content: nice camera and thats not just for the money but for the features.  The battery life is also much better then expected, last a full day.

Reviews.Title: EXCELENTE
Reviews.Author: Isabel Delgado
Reviews.Content: EL PRODUCTO ERA LO QUE ESPERABA, QUEDE CONFORME, ME GUSTO LA CALIDAD, EXITOS EXITOS EXITOS. EXITOS, EXITOS. BUEN PRODUCTO. SUERTE

Reviews.Title: Nice camera for the money
Reviews.Author: wolf
Reviews.Content: The camera takes very nice pictures, but is a bit slow. If you want to take a pictures of moving objects, or want to take several shots in rapid succession, this camera may not be best for you. If you like taking pictures of yourself, then having an LCD screen on the front of the camera is a plus.

Reviews.Title: NOT A DUAL
Reviews.Author: O. Quintero "OSC02"
Reviews.Content: Camera itself is OK. I did not want to bring it down due to this issue, but the camera displayed and described is not a dual screen. Front LCD does not come with this camera. We have a similar camera with dual and very similar features and works well. Great to be able to upload photos straight from the camera......however, if you are getting this camera for the dual screens, this is not it....

Reviews.Title: We love this Camera
Reviews.Author: Kathryn Hester
Reviews.Content: We love this camera!!! The best feature is being able to upload directly to wifi since we usually use our smart phones this is great to help not take up so much space on our iphones. Love this camera.

Reviews.Title: new camera
Reviews.Author: john
Reviews.Content: This has been a good camera so far, haven't got to use it very much though because been really busy. Spring is just around the corner so will be taking lots of pics.

Reviews.Title: Awesome Camera
Reviews.Author: AdamLeno
Reviews.Content: Great price, great camera. I bought it refurbished. Its like new. Bought it for my girlfriend as a Christmas present. She loves it.

Reviews.Title: Camara
Reviews.Author: Susana Rendon
Reviews.Content: La camara excelente, me encanto era lo que esperaba segun las especificaciones del vendedor, el tiempo fue el esperado. Muy bien

Reviews.Title: EXCELENTE
Reviews.Author: gabriela
Reviews.Content: BUEN PRODUCTO,SEGUN LO OFRECIDO,BUENAS FOTOS,CALIDAD DE IMAGEN,PERFECTO AL USAR MOBIL LINK,PREFECTO TAMAÑO Y PESO PARA EL MANEJO Y BUEN PRECIO,RECOMENDADO A TODOS.

Reviews.Title: SAMSUNG
Reviews.Author: Washington
Reviews.Content: Un producto de lo mejor les recomiendo para sus recuerdos de la vida diaria.Les felicito por este produsto de samsung realmente es la tecnoilogia en una camara.

Reviews.Title: me encanta mi cama
Reviews.Author: Mayra
Reviews.Content: esta camara se las recomiendo toma unas fotos bellas y de buena calidad, ademas de la cantidad de funciones que trae consigo... se las recomiendo

Reviews.Title: Excellent
Reviews.Author: Johnny Villegas
Reviews.Content: Good morning! GOOD product. I am so happy and the product complay my expectations. Thanks a lot!Johnny Villegas Perez

Reviews.Title: Good cam
Reviews.Author: Juan Ponce "Relámpago Azul"
Reviews.Content: Es una cámara con buenas prestaciones sobre todo para el precio, la memoria no es SD, es micro SD, tener en cuenta.A very good camera for the price, with 16 megapixels you will don't loose a detail, use Micro SD, looks solid at the moment.

Reviews.Title: not what i expected
Reviews.Author: moonyj2k1
Reviews.Content: So looking at the camera and the specs, i had one thing in mind about what i was going to receive....until o actually got the camera and i was quite disappointed. Ok so the dual view is great but the camera itself is cheap looking. its so light-weight like plastic. Photo Quality could be better, not impressed. In fact, pictures taken with my phone look better. If you are looking for a basic camera then this is for you. If you need even a little wow factor, try something else. I would return it but I've already opened it and I'm too lazy to go through the hassle. I'll just take the L on this one....

Reviews.Title: Excelent product!! Recommend 100%
Reviews.Author: Oscar Jaimes
Reviews.Content: Excelent product!! Recommend 100% This NEW product you are browsing has been inspected by our certified technicians to ensure that it meets factory specifications

ProductInfo.Features:
Wireless - enabled
1.5-Inch Dual View LCD front screen
5x Optical zoom
ProductInfo.Name: Samsung DV300F Dual View Smart Camera - Black (EC-DV300FBPBUS)
